title: Frontend Developer Internship
description: Join our dynamic team to build modern web applications using React and TypeScript. Work on real-world projects that impact thousands of users.

title: Data Science Intern
description: Work with our data team to analyze customer behavior and build predictive models. You'll learn advanced machine learning techniques.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Build end-to-end solutions for our clients. Gain experience in both frontend and backend development.

title: UX/UI Designer Intern
description: Create beautiful and intuitive user interfaces. Work with our design team to improve user experiences.

title: DevOps Engineer Intern
description: Learn infrastructure as code and cloud deployment strategies. Work with modern DevOps tools.
